name: De Sanzuane Studio Legale Internazionale
goal:
De Sanzuane Studio legale Internazionale is a leading law firm in Italy. Our strengths are more than 100 of counsel professionals who drive the firm in the offices in Northen Italy - Bologna, and abroad, as in Usa, Turkey, with strong partnership relationship and long term cooperation with law firm based in Milan, Rome, London, Brussels, Tokyo and Shanghai, a vocation for innovation and independence and a great client base.

We deliver integrated legal services to enterprises and financial institutions through multidisciplinary teams reflecting client needs. We believe the growth in the number and needs of our clients is testimony to the success of our strengths and our culture.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Trade, Competition, Transport, Energy, Intellectual Property, State Aids, Food & Agriculture
